thread.title: Joe’s ‘like a caveman’ with Sofia, says Modern Family co-star
thread.title_full: Joe’s ‘like a caveman’ with Sofia, says Modern Family co-star | DailyTelegraph

author: Network Writers
title: Joe’s ‘like a caveman’ with Sofia, says Modern Family co-star
text:
THEY already make the vast majority of us feel inadequate with their blinding good looks, but it seems there’s something more “primal” at work, which binds Modern Family star Sofia Vergara and her fiance Joe Manganiello together: raw passion. Well, according to Vergara’s Modern Family co-star Julie Bowen anyway.
Joe and Sofia's 'primal' passion Speaking to Us Weekly at an event in West Hollywood, Bowen said: “He’s like a caveman with her. It’s sexy! I love it. She’s so strong, and so [used to] calling the shots all the time, and then you see them together and there’s a part of her that kind of melts. It just warms your heart when you see that, because it’s not all the time that you can tell that there’s an aspect to this relationship that’s very — how shall we say? — primal.”
Sofia Vergara at Magic Mike XXL premiere The 45-year-old Modern Family actress added that she’s thinking of throwing Vergara a wedding shower on set — but isn’t quite sure how to plan a party fitting of her vivacious co-star.
Other Stories Murray brothers edge Aussies in Cup epic Tennis 0 comments Abbotts dogged by pack of rabid foes Opinion 0 comments Libs win Canning by-election Live 0 comments Goodes says that’s enough after 372 games Afl 0 comments Women winners in new Cabinet Nsw 0 comments NRL investigates loss of 2534 juniors Nrl 0 comments “You’re like, ‘Oh, Sofia, what do you want for your wedding shower?’ And she’s going to be like, ‘Ay, I want a toaster and some plates,’” she joked. “She has a beautiful new house. And her to-be husband is a minor deity — or a major deity.”
The stars celebrate their first anniversary Vergara and Manganiello announced their engagement last December after dating for six months, with sources suggesting they plan to marry in late November at a resort in Florida.
“They want all their family and friends there celebrating,” a source told Us Weekly . “It’ll be the most fun wedding ever!”
Adds the insider, “Sofia and Joe are really happy. They’re such a natural couple and they already feel married.”
Modern Family stars Joe’s ‘like a caveman’ with Sofia
